alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hardee and northwestern DeSoto Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 521 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arcadia, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Arcadia, Southeast Arcadia, Limestone, Brownville and Gardner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
